alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 30 at 2:02AM CST until December 30 at 9:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility of a quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Illinois, Jo Daviess County. In Iowa, Cedar, Clinton, Jackson, Jones, Muscatine, Scott, and Dubuque Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Slick spots will be possible due to below freezing temperatures, especially on bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Watch out for slippery spots on roadways due to freezing fog.
